bill.title: Public property; authorize IHLs to transfer and enter into certain lease agreements regarding facilities.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Department Of Finance And Administration, Acting On Behalf Of The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning, To Lease Real Property Under The Possession And Control Of A State Institution Of Higher Learning; To Authorize Dfa To Enter Into A Financing Agreement For The Lease Of The Property For Certain Purposes To Benefit The State Institution Of Higher Learning; To Provide For The Terms Of The Financing Agreement; To Require That A Lease-leaseback Agreement Be Entered Into By The Partnering Entity And The Independent Funding Source, To Provide That The Conveyed Property Shall Remain Exempt From Ad Valorem And Property Tax Requirements; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Property;Universities and Colleges
